translations: [有化]儿茶素；儿茶酚（catechin 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: It may be because you are lacking catechins in your brain.
sentences.translation: 这也许正是因为您的大脑里少了儿茶素。

sentences.sentence: Catechins are antioxidants thought to protect the body against damage from oxygen.
sentences.translation: 八茶酸是一种抗氧化剂，可抗眼部氧化。

sentences.sentence: Freshly brewed green or black tea is extremely beneficial to your brain because it is full of catechins.
sentences.translation: 现泡的绿茶或红茶对您的大脑极其有利，因为它们富含儿茶素。
